alert.note: Alert for Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 03 at 10:54PM PST until January 06 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM WEDNESDAY TO 3 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of up 9 to 18 inches above 7500 feet. South winds 30 to 45 mph gusting as high as 70 mph. * WHERE...Ventura County Mountains. * WHEN...From 9 AM Wednesday to 3 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially Thursday and Thursday night on Lockwood Valley Road. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.
